ygData.subject: Re: Did ya hear this???
ygData.msgSnippet: I heard the regent costs about 150 plat... Rokenn
ygData.messageBody:
I heard the regent costs about 150 plat...

Rokenn


>From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Did ya hear this???
>Date: Mon, 13 Dec 1999 17:08:36 -0500 (EST)
>
>Brad himself responded to these questions.
>
>1. The spell is a drop from a monster.
>
>2. The regeant can be bought from a vendor.
>
>No locations were given, the necro has to be in your group for the spell
>to work, and the player's corpse closest to the necro is summoned.
>
>
> >
> > From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
> >
> > There is a Summon Corpse spell. Your corpse can be pulled from anywhere
>in
> > the current zone to the feet of the caster (necro I believe.) Also
>rumored
> > to require a reagent (black enameled coffin???) not yet located on mobs
>or
> > vendors.
> >
> > Any info?
> >
> > Sylly
> >
> > p.s. saw a post and person asked what mob in Paw dropped this spell. Not
> > sure if he meant spell or the reagent.
> >
> > > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
>lol@... with the subject submissions.
> >
>
